thread.title: Michelle Pedreschi
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Michelle Pedreschi

author: Michelle Pedreschi
title: Michelle Pedreschi
text: I went in store to buy a top could not find the size I wanted and a young man asked could he help and said he would check on line - he explained I could order it and have it delivered the next day to my house. The next morning a lovely man arrived at my door with the top very pleasant.
